meanings.definition: A southern constellation representing an air pump.
meanings.sent1: In the night sky, you can see the antlia constellation shining brightly.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the antlia constellation to learn more about stars.
meanings.sent3: The antlia constellation looks like a giant pump in the sky!
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like the stars in the antlia constellation.
meanings.sent5: The antlia constellation twinkled like a magical beacon above.

meanings.definition: A genus of small air-breathing mollusks.
meanings.sent1: The antlia mollusks live in the shallow waters near the shore.
meanings.sent2: Marine biologists study the behavior of antlia mollusks in their natural habitat.
meanings.sent3: The antlia mollusks had a party on the beach last night!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled up from within her like an antlia mollusk coming up for air.
meanings.sent5: The antlia mollusks danced gracefully in the ocean currents.
